amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), add the following: SEC.___. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used to provide arms, training, or other assistance to the Azov Battalion.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to provide arms, training, or other assistance to the Azov Battalion.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Conyers amendment (A052) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A052) offered by Mr. Conyers.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Conyers amendment (A052) Agreed to by voice vote.
